premiumPotionNoDropExplanation: Wizardy Hatching Potz can no be used on eggyz received from Questiez. The only way 2 get Wizardy Hatching Potz iz buy bying dem belowz, no from randomz dropz.
dropsExplanationEggs: Spendie Gemz 2 get eggyz moar quiccly, if u don't want 2 wait 4 standardz eggyz 2 dropz, or 2 repeat Questiez 2 getz Questiez eggyz. Learnie moar about da dropz systemz.
dropsExplanation: Getz deez itemz fastz wit Gemz if u dont wantz 2 wait 4 dem 2 dropz when competing a task. Learnz moar aboutz da dropz systemz.
